attributes.action: I ask for parlimentary support in boycotting companies that relocate post Brexit
attributes.additional_details: Did you know that companies including HSBC, EasyJet & Vodafone are considering a move of their offices out of the UK and into mainland Europe? This would mean that over 5,000 UK jobs are at risk. We need your help to stop this happening. Help us to put the GREAT back into Great Britain by boycotting these companies & any others that threaten to leave the UK. A united, Scotland, Wales, Northern Ireland & England must stand together by supporting UK based companies. #Letstakebackthepower
attributes.background: We want the government and the people of the United Kingdom to unite in threatening to boycott, the services and products of any business, that plans to relocate out of the UK, post Brexit, risking thousands of British jobs.

rejection.details:
We're not sure what you mean by "parliamentary support". 

You could start a new petition calling on the Government to require all government bodies and agencies not to enter into contracts with any company that plans to leave the UK because of its exit from the European Union.
